description: The production of the second State of Youth Report for the Federal Youth Secretariat (FYS) housed and has the report be ready for publication by July 2025.
full_summary:
# Canadian Heritage Solicitation

Solicitation Reference Number: 10233032 - B

## Notice Type and Duration

This solicitation is a Request for Proposal (RFP), and the notice type is "Request for Proposal". The contracting authority is Canadian Heritage, housed within the Federal Youth Secretariat.

## Tender Goals

The second State of Youth Report (SOYR) is planned to be published in July 2025. The report will provide accurate information on youth in Canada and serve as an update to the first SOYR. It will highlight federal initiatives and projects that may be of interest to youth.

## Security Requirements

Bidders must demonstrate a proven track record and experience working with or for youth. The government is seeking a contractor with expertise in state of the art writing and translations for this project, as well as experience with publishing textbooks or research materials.

## Selection Methodology

Bidders will be assessed on the following criteria:

1. Project Plan
2. Experience with Youth Engagement Projects
3. Writing and Translations Skills
4. Publishing Experience
5. Proposed Security Requirements and Safeguards

Bidders will be evaluated based on a holistic assessment of these criteria. Bids not meeting the mandatory requirements will be declared non-responsive.

## Technical Evaluation Criteria

Bidders must provide a detailed Project Plan with a methodology that describes and demonstrates the approach to data collection and analysis, highlighting the active involvement of youth. Bidders must also provide evidence of their experience working with youth, including two (2) projects demonstrating their expertise in youth engagement and analysis.

## Mandatory Financial Criteria

The maximum funding available for the Contract resulting from the bid solicitation is $300,000 (applicable taxes extra).

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-12 at 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Award Date: After evaluation of bids
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-01-31

To obtain a detailed copy of the solicitation document, please visit the Canada Buys website. You must log in to access the document. Provucre a valid login credentials to obtain access.
